data.title: Strategy CEO on bitcoin buying strategy amid crypto volatility
data.description: As bitcoin (BTC-USD) climbs back above $90,000 on Tuesday, Strategy (MSTR) CEO Phong Le sits down with Julie Hyman to talk about the crypto treasury firm's bitcoin buying strategy as the cryptocurrency continues to experience volatility. Watch the full interview with Phong Le by clicking here. Also catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with Strategy co-founder and executive chairman Michael Saylor from our 2025 Invest conference. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
data.keywords: Phong Le, Julie Hyman, Michael Saylor
